channel.title: How can i change the weapon attack speed?
channel.description: I want a whip to hit faster as normal

item.title: How can i change the weapon attack speed?
item.dc:creator: @imstrength imstrength
item.description:
@imstrength wrote:

[quote=“RandQm, post:2, topic:465434”][quote author=Jerotix link=topic=570626.msg4133628#msg4133628 date=1351446555]
I want a whip to hit faster as normal
[/quote]
adjust the timer[/quote]

thanks that was 100% useless…post useful information or dont post.

@OP if your on a [PI] you need to go to combatassistant.java and search for:

then find the case for whip so

then find the return statement right underneath it…the lower the number the faster it will hit…

if you cant find 4151 then you need to add it

case 4151: return 4;

that will make it alil faster than normal

(normal is 5)

Read full topic
